name: Tribocalypse VR
description: Do you even skirmish? If not, then keep calm and try to defend your totem from thieving tribols! In this action filled VR game you can rain arrows on endless waves of enemies while thinning their ranks with exploding fire flasks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i7-4820K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11
